snippet: Renée Fleming led the cast of “Otello” during its opening-night revival on Tuesday at the Metropolitan Opera.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews Metropolitan Opera production of Verdi's Otello, starring soprano Renee Fleming and tenor Johan Botha.
lead_paragraph: Renée Fleming led the cast of “Otello” during its opening-night revival on Tuesday at the Metropolitan Opera.

headline.seo: Renée Fleming in ‘Otello’ Revival at the Met
headline.main: Returning to a Special Role, Maybe for the Last Time
headline.print_headline: Returning to a Special Role, Maybe for the Last Time
